attributes.action: Reverse the policy of splitting the home office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If your house was falling down would you knock it down or rebuild the foundations?

I know which I would do. By splitting the Home Office into two it is merely knocking a wall down rather than dealing with the long-term subsistence.

It will not deal with the issues of mass immigration, knife/gun crime policing or  any of the othe numerous pressing issues affecting our security in the broad and narrow sense.

Finally where is the debate on this momentous move?

There is none and that is above all why I am starting this petition.
